00:00 New Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Live-Action Reboot
The Turtles are back – and this time everything is going to be different! As The Hollywood Reporter reports, a "Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles" reboot in the form of a live-action film is in the works.

01:36 Rush Hour 4 Is in Development!
With "Rush Hour 4", one of the most popular action-comedy series is about to make a comeback! However, the background to this is rather curious: According to the portal Semfor, US President Donald Trump is said to have played a role in this development.
